name: @btclib/satsnet-api
author: icehugh <ygz14835187@163.com>
description: A high-performance satsnet protocol API library with universal runtime support for Bun, Node.js, Deno, Edge Runtimes, and Browsers

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --splitting && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format cjs --outfile index.cjs && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:web: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --splitting --minify && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:deno: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --splitting --minify && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json && cp dist/index.js dist/deno.js
scripts.build:edge: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --splitting --minify && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:universal: bun run build:web && cp dist/index.js dist/universal.js
scripts.build:cloudflare: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --splitting --minify && node scripts/postprocess-cloudflare.js
scripts.build:all: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run build:web && bun run build:deno && bun run build:universal
scripts.build:prod: bun run clean && bun run build:prod:esm && bun run build:prod:cjs && bun run build:types && bun run minify && bun run build:web && bun run build:deno
scripts.build:prod:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --splitting --minify
scripts.build:prod:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --target node --format cjs --outfile dist/index.cjs --minify
scripts.build:deno:prod: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target deno --format esm --splitting --minify --outfile dist/deno.js
scripts.minify: bun run minify:esm && bun run minify:cjs
scripts.predeploy:cloudflare: bun run build:cloudflare && bun run test:cloudflare
